message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.  Time is money!
Come on Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, let's be real.  The longer this goes on, the less we both get.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
